The founding father of the Gucci fashion house, named Guccio Gucci, was created in 1881 in Florence, Italy; the son of an Italian merchant. In 1906 he developed a small family business selling leather saddles and bags. His reputation grew as hired top-quality craftsmen to use him. In 1921 he expanded his trade and founded the Gucci company, which carried on growing. 1938 saw the opening of a boutique in Rome, as well as in 1947 he introduced the trademark bamboo handled handbag.

Other designs harkened to his saddle-making days; a selected stripped webbing based from a saddle girth, or even a design for suede shoes, inspired with a metal horse-bit. Later, Gucci's son Aldo took on the company and helped to make it what it is today ?a globally selling corporate conglomeration with lines of replica gucci handbags, wallets, shoes, luggage, jewelry, and gifts.

Famous fashion residence Louis Vuitton was founded within 1854. Louis Vuitton obtained their status inside producing suitcases. Thats why he or she was a trunk-maker for the Napoleon 3 wife.
